title: Ultrafast Charging/Discharging and Highly Stable Non-aqueous Iron-Ion Batteries using Iron oxide (Fe3O4) Microspheres as Efficient Cathode Material
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE00970C, Paper
Jitendra K Yadav, Bharti Rani, Priyanka Saini, Anant Prakash Pandey, Ambesh Dixit
Rechargeable iron-ion batteries (RIIBs) are considered one of the alternatives to lithium-ion batteries (LIBs) due to their high volumetric energy density and low-cost fabrication in ambient conditions. A crucial aspect...
